message.subject: Vitol/Enron ISDA
message.content:
M1.1. Hi, Stephanie,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. I wanted to check where we are on the ISDA ...
[Inform: David wanted to check status of ISDA]
Sflink1.2
M1.3. we sent you a proposal at the
end of Sept, and you and I have exchanged a couple of emails since then, but
overall I believe that the ball is still ' in your court'.
[Inform: David sent Stephanie a proposal at the end of September, and despite intervening emails, it seems that it is Stephanie's turn to act]
M1.4. Is this correct?
[Request-Information: is this true]
Flink1.4
M1.5. Regards, David
[Conventional: signature]
M1.6. David Fransen
M1.7. Vitol SA Geneva
M1.8. Tel : 00-41-22-322-1111
[Inform: David's contact information]
**********************************************************************
This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and
intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they
are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify
the sender.
**********************************************************************

message.subject: Vitol/Enron ISDA
message.content:
M2.1. Darren,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. Have you reviewed the comments from Vitol?
[Request-Information: has Darren reviewed comments from David at Vitol]
Blink1.2
Flink2.2

message.subject: Vitol/Enron ISDA
message.content:
M3.1. I was out of town on Friday.
[Inform: no, Darren was out of town on Friday]
Blink2.2
M3.2. I will try to get to it today
[Inform: Darren will try to get to comments today]
